summary: The module defines a configurable attention‑gated U‑Net model and its supporting building blocks (convolutional, up‑sampling and attention modules) for N‑dimensional image segmentation.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use deep learning architecture that improves multi‑class segmentation accuracy in medical imaging by focusing on salient regions through attention mechanisms, while allowing customization of depth, kernel sizes, strides and regularisation.
